title: OpenAI unveils search browser in challenge to Google
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Oct 21 announced an "Atlas" search browser, leveraging its artificial intelligence prowess in a direct challenge to Google Chrome.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI on Oct 21 announced an "Atlas" search browser, leveraging its artificial intelligence prowess in a direct challenge to Google Chrome.

title: Satya Nadella’s pay hits $96.5 million as Microsoft’s AI push pays off
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella’s pay soared to $96.5 million in FY25, as the board credited his leadership in making Microsoft a global leader in artificial intelligence.
content: Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella’s pay package jumped to $96.5 million for fiscal 2025, his highest compensation since he became CEO more than a decade ago, with the board citing the company’s progress in artificial intelligence.... [1090 chars]

title: TRM Labs Partners With Cyber Security Agency of Singapore to Advance National Cyber Threat Intelligence in the Blockchain Space
description: SINGAPORE, Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TRM Labs today announced that it has signed a Memorandum of Collaboration (MOC) with the Cyber Security Agency of Singapore (CSA) to strengthen national cyber resilience with Artificial Intelligence (AI) powered blockchain intelligence. Under the MOC, TRM will grant CSA access to its blockchain intelligence platform and associated AI features - including generative and reasoning components - while contributing data and technical expertise to co-develop solutions tailored to CSA’s long-term operational needs.
content: SINGAPORE, Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TRM Labs today announced that it has signed a Memorandum of Collaboration (MOC) with the Cyber Security Agency of Singapore (CSA) to strengthen national cyber resilience with Artificial Intelligence (AI) p... [3440 chars]

title: Suzanne Somers' husband to release AI clone of late actress
description: Alan Hamel, who married the "Three's Company" star in 1977, revealed that he's forging ahead with plans to create an artificial intelligence version of his late wife.
content:

title: Hack Yourself: How To Find Uses For AI In Everything You Do At Work
description: To use artificial intelligence at work, think about the things you can stop doing, the things you can do better and the new things you can do.
content:
Imagine the future of your job. Now imagine how, enabled by generative artificial intelligence, you can destroy it.

title: Florida law targets using AI to ‘nudify’ people’s photos
description: A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.
content:
A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.

title: AI not a reliable source of news, EU media study says

content:
Paris, France—Artificial intelligence assistants such as ChatGPT made errors about half the time when asked about news events, according to a vast study by European public broadcasters released Wednesday.

title: Meta in $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital for Louisiana data center
description: (Reuters) -Meta has struck a $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital to fund its biggest data center project globally, as large technology companies race to build out the infrastructure needed to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.
